article.title: STG to Support Signal Center
article.text: STG Inc., Reston, Va. was awarded a $16,989,443 modification (P00009) to contract W91RUS-13-C-0003 for non-personnel information technology services and support requirement for the 2nd Signal Center, continental United States-Theater Network Operations and Security Center. Army Contracting Command, Fort Huachuca is the contracting activity.
